actions.name: Imposter

cost.trigger: At the start of combat or when the user is switched in.

actions.description:
Trigger: At the start of combat or when the user is switched in.

Effect: Connection - Transform. The user freely uses Transform. This cannot be interrupted. When using Transform, the user can spend an additional 2 PP to double the duration of Transform.

system.description:
Trigger: At the start of combat or when the user is switched in.

Effect: Connection - Transform. The user freely uses Transform. This cannot be interrupted. When using Transform, the user can spend an additional 2 PP to double the duration of Transform.
